ovdesc.p: Target codes defined on this table are assigned to Customer records of T24 to indicate how the Customer fits in with the Bank's overall marketing strategy. For example, Target codes could be defined as Prime Customer, High Net Worth etc.

desc.p: Describes the Target code and is used for enrichment of the Code.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the Target code in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES) and will indicate to the User the Language in which the Description must be entered.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. Multivalue field. (Mandatory input)
Describes the Target in an abbreviated form which can be used for reporting when space is limited.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter a short description of the Target code in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES) and will indicate to the User the language in which this short description must be entered.
3-15 type AA (alphanumeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. Multivalue field. (Mandatory input)
This is the code by which this Target can be identified.
The code must be in the range 1-9999 and represents the ID of the table.
